application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

div.head: Background Modeling
div.p: Personal factor p(i, loc) captures the probability that a user i visits a location loc.
Global factor g(loc) captures the popularity of a location loc.
Meeting events for user i and user j: E = (e1, e2, e3).
div.formula: e1(loc1, t1) e2(loc2, t2) e3(loc3, t3)

div.head: Mobility Relationship Mining
div.p: Personal factor p(i, loc1), p(j, loc1)
